mentions.text: @operatino sorry, I thought the re-tweet of the question would expose the replies already. Thanks for the heads up.
@operatino the problem is using a REST api instead of GraphQL and then trying to manage, sync, store, cache, query all the server data.
@operatino I'm thinking of using something like https://t.co/HNRge8pjl7 to "recreate" a partial/cached version of the DB, and then query it
@LocalSourceNL @operatino this team might want to have a look at https://t.co/S35gsdWoMP
@operatino I thought the reply without your name on it would do the trick. It seems no. :/ Sorry about that.
@operatino @LocalSourceNL @dicode I'm interested in hearing what performance improvements @PlanetBooking has been working on.
@operatino Yo dude! I'm going to host a react native meetup. Can I dm you some questions?
@operatino @ReactAmsterdam it would be the same topic. Let me check my schedule and ask the ReactNL guys whether they are cool with that
@operatino @ReactAmsterdam alternatively, I could recycle a team mate's talk
@operatino @notbrent @ReactAmsterdam would be nice to see you there, Brent üçª
@operatino - heya robert! i'd love to attend, i could probably give a quick informal demo but don't have time to prepare a full talk
